name: Computing Department
tagline: Our redesign of the Sheffield Hallam University Computing Department website
body:
Now Hosted live at [http://coding.georgelangham.net/Comp-Dept](http://coding.georgelangham.net/Comp-Dept)
***
At this point in time the development is as far as we want to take it for this prototype.

At a later point we may come back and fix bugs and add features.

But currently the prototype shall remain closed as it is.
***
## Contributions 

Contribution by @beth1991 and @georgiel -> Bethany still hasn't quite got the hang of Github so though her commits aren't shown, she actually ended up asking me to commit them for her.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
